body_content.explanation: to form something new from several different things, or to combine several different things in a new way:
examples: Expansion of the programme would begin to reweave the social safety net for the 21st century.
Between them they re-wove the fabric of horse racing in this country.

body_content.explanation: to repair cloth by repeatedly crossing a single thread through two sets of long threads :
examples: Holes in sweaters can be rewoven or mended.
Restorers re-wove the linen fabric in places where there were holes.
